testcase.purpose: This test validates the WebIDL included in the WebRTC specification
Check if readonly RTCPeerConnection.localDescription exists and type of object
Check if readonly RTCPeerConnection.remoteDescription exists and type of object
Check if readonly RTCPeerConnection.signalingState exists and type of string
Check if readonly RTCPeerConnection.iceGatheringState exists and type of string
Check if readonly RTCPeerConnection.iceConnectionState exists and type of string
Check if RTCPeerConnection.onnegotiationneeded exists
Check if RTCPeerConnection.onicecandidate exists
Check if RTCPeerConnection.onsignalingstatechange exists
Check if RTCPeerConnection.onaddstream exists
Check if RTCPeerConnection.onremovestream exists
Check if RTCPeerConnection.oniceconnectionstatechange exists
Check if RTCPeerConnection.ondatachannel exists
Check if RTCPeerConnection.createOffer exists and type of function
Check if RTCPeerConnection.createAnswer exists and type of function
Check if RTCPeerConnection.setLocalDescription exists and type of function
Check if RTCPeerConnection.setRemoteDescription exists and type of function
Check if RTCPeerConnection.updateIce exists and type of function
Check if RTCPeerConnection.addIceCandidate exists and type of function
Check if RTCPeerConnection.getLocalStreams exists and type of function
Check if RTCPeerConnection.getRemoteStreams exists and type of function
Check if RTCPeerConnection.getStreamById exists and type of function
Check if RTCPeerConnection.addStream exists and type of function
Check if RTCPeerConnection.removeStream exists and type of function
Check if RTCPeerConnection.close exists and type of function
Check if RTCPeerConnection.createDataChannel exists and type of function
Check if RTCPeerConnection.getStats exists and type of function
Check if the readonly attribute peerIdentity of RTCPeerConnection exists and type of RTCIdentityAssertion
Check if RTCPeerConnection.onidentityresult exists
Check if RTCPeerConnection.setIdentityProvider exists and type of function
Check if RTCPeerConnection.getIdentityAssertion exists and type of function
Check if the readonly attribute sdpLineNumber of RTCSdpError exists and type of number
Check if RTCSessionDescription.type exists and type of string
Check if RTCSessionDescription.sdp exists and type of string
Check if RTCIceCandidate.candidate exists and type of string
Check if RTCIceCandidate.sdpMid exists and type of string
Check if RTCIceCandidate.sdpMLineIndex exists and type of number
Check if the readonly attribute candidate of RTCPeerConnectionIceEvent exists and type of string
Check if readonly RTCDataChannel.label exists and type of string
Check if readonly RTCDataChannel.ordered exists and type of boolean
Check if readonly RTCDataChannel.maxRetransmitTime exists and type of number
Check if readonly RTCDataChannel.maxRetransmits exists and type of number
Check if readonly RTCDataChannel.protocol exists and type of string
Check if readonly RTCDataChannel.negotiated exists and type of boolean
Check if readonly RTCDataChannel.id exists and type of number
Check if readonly RTCDataChannel.readyState exists and type of string
Check if readonly RTCDataChannel.bufferedAmount exists and type of number
Check if RTCDataChannel.binaryType exists and type of string
Check if RTCDataChannel.onopen exists
Check if RTCDataChannel.onerror exists
Check if RTCDataChannel.onclose exists
Check if RTCDataChannel.onmessage exists
Check if RTCDataChannel.close exists and type of function
Check if RTCDataChannel.send exists and type of function
Check if the readonly attribute channel of RTCDataChannelEvent exists and type of RTCDataChannel
Check if RTCPeerConnection.createDTMFSender exists and type of function
Check if readonly RTCDTMFSender.canInsertDTMF exists and type of boolean
Check if readonly RTCDTMFSender.track exists and type of mediaStreamTrack
Check if readonly RTCDTMFSender.toneBuffer exists and type of string
Check if readonly RTCDTMFSender.duration exists and type of number
Check if readonly RTCDTMFSender.interToneGap exists and type of number
Check if RTCDTMFSender.ontonechange exists
Check if RTCDTMFSender.insertDTMF exists and type of function
Check if the readonly attribute tone of RTCDTMFToneChangeEvent exists and type of string
Check if RTCStatsReport.RTCStats exists and type of function
Check if the attribute assertion of RTCIdentityEvent exists and type of string
Check if the readonly attribute stream of MediaStreamEvent exists and type of MediaStream
Check if the setting of RTCDataChannel.binaryType is normally
Check if the RTCDataChannel.bufferedAmount init value is 0
Check if the setting of RTCDataChannel.id is normally
Check if the setting of RTCDataChannel.label is normally
Check if the setting of RTCDataChannel.maxRetransmits is normally
Check if the setting of RTCDataChannel.maxRetransmitTime is normally
Check if the setting of RTCDataChannel.negotiated is normally
Check if the setting of RTCDataChannel.ordered is normally
Check if the setting of RTCDataChannel.protocol is normally
Check if the setting of RTCDataChannel.readyState is normally
Check if the method of addIceCandidate is valid
Check if the setting of RTCPeerConnection.createDTMFSender is normally
Check if the method of close is valid
Check if the method of RTCPeerConnection.createDataChannel is valid
Check if the method of setLocalDescription is valid
Check if the init value of RTCPeerConnection.iceConnectionState is new
Check if the init value of RTCPeerConnection.iceGatheringState is new
Check if the init value of RTCPeerConnection.localDescription is null
Check if the init value of RTCPeerConnection.remoteDescription is null
Check if the init value of RTCPeerConnection.signalingState is stable
Check if when the close() method is invoked, the signalingState value is closed
Check if the method of updateIce is valid
Check if the the setting of RTCSessionDescription.sdp is normally
Check if the the setting of RTCSessionDescription.type is normally
Check if the event of datachannel is valid
Check if the event of iceconnectionstatechange is valid
Check if the event of signalingstatechange is valid
Check if the setting of RTCPeerConnectionIceEvent.candidate is normally
Check if the setting of RTCDTMFSender.canInsertDTMF is normally
Check if the RTCPeerConnection.getLocalStreams() return a sequence of MediaStream objects
Check if the RTCPeerConnection.getRemoteStreams() return a sequence of MediaStream objects
Check if the RTCPeerConnection.onnegotiationneeded is valid
Check if the RTCPeerConnection.onicecandidate is valid
Check if the RTCPeerConnection.onsignalingstatechange is valid
Check if the RTCPeerConnection.onaddstream is valid
Check if the RTCPeerConnection.onremovestream is valid
Check if the RTCPeerConnection.oniceconnectionstatechange is valid
Check if the RTCPeerConnection.setIdentityProvider is valid
Check if the RTCPeerConnection.getIdentityAssertion is valid
Check if the RTCPeerConnection.close is valid
Check if if the new RTCIceCandidate
Check if candidate
Check if sdpMid
Check if sdpMLineIndex
Check if new RTCIceCandidate(initializer)
Check if initializer candidate
Check if initializer sdpMid
Check if initializer sdpMLineIndex
Check if RTCIceCandidate({})
Check if RTCIceCandidate({})
Check if RTCIceCandidate('foobar')
Check if RTCPeerConnection [add|remove]Stream
Check if RTCPeerConnection createAnswer
Check if RTCPeerConnection createOffer
Check that connecting is the initial state of a RTCDataChannel object created with createDataChannel()
Check that RTCPeerConnection.createDataChannel('label1') creates an ordered datachannel
Check that RTCPeerConnection.createDataChannel('label2', {}) creates an ordered datachannel
Check that RTCPeerConnection.createDataChannel('label3', {ordered:true}) creates an ordered datachannel
Check that RTCPeerConnection.createDataChannel('label3', {ordered:false}) creates a non-ordered datachannel
Check that RTCPeerConnection.createDataChannel('label3', {maxRetransmits:0}) creates a non-ordered datachannel
Check that RTCPeerConnection.createDataChannel('label3', {maxRetransmitTime:0}) creates a non-ordered datachannel
Check that a datachannel event is fired when a data channel is created and connected
Check that a data channel is able to send and receive messages of type string and array buffer
Check if the method RTCDTMFSender of RTCPeerConnection
Check if the method addIceCandidate of RTCPeerConnection
Check if the method localDescription of RTCPeerConnection
Check if the method remoteDescription of RTCPeerConnection
Check if the attribute onnegotiationneeded of RTCPeerConnection
Check if the attribute signalingState of RTCPeerConnection
Check if the constructor of RTCPeerConnection
